page.title: 16HEALTH
page.content: There is one child welfair clinic in Wotten Rd, next door to Cofton school. There are no doctors,dentists,opticians chiropdists in our area, but all these sces are within one mile of Cofton school. One pupil, aged ten years, has a hole in his heart, but takes place in sports ativities. Seventeen pupils have respirtory problems and use inhalers in ol. One parent uses a wheelchair a result of a road accident many yaers ago. Here is how one young girl keeps fit....."I always try to stay healthy. I aways have an apple a day. There's a saying Â£An apple a day keeps the dentist away'. I brush my teeth three times a day. I always run five times around the garden. Then i do five sit ups, ten jumping jacks and five press ups. That should keep me heathy.
